body_html:
i think Sam has been changing the repr to look like:

nn.Embedding(num_embeddings=10, embedding_dim=20)

Something that can kinda be copy-pasted into a console.
Can you make this look like that?

body:
i think Sam has been changing the __repr__ to look like: 
```
nn.Embedding(num_embeddings=10, embedding_dim=20)
```

Something that can kinda be copy-pasted into a console.
Can you make this look like that?
